about_the_game:
With the Ealnos open flat wagon you can move coal, ores, wood and more in large quantities. Up to 60 m3 can be transported.
The wagon is used in Great Britain and comes in three different colour variations. Blue, light grey and dark grey from GBRf and VTG respectively.
Different degrees of dirt, animated couplings as well as its own sound round off this package.

Features:
- Ealnos in blue, dark and light grey
- detailed textures
- VTG or GBRf lettering
- random colour selection
- realistic sound
- animated coupling and hoses
- ACS Coupling support
- Commodities supported (Ore, LimeStine, Woodchips, Gravel, Sand, Coal)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
